thread.title: A Grass Snake Plays Dead on a Cold Autumn Day
thread.title_full: A Grass Snake Plays Dead on a Cold Autumn Day

author: Glen Tickle
title: A Grass Snake Plays Dead on a Cold Autumn Day
text:
A grass snake in Denmark plays dead on a cold autumn day as a natural defense mechanism against predators and curious people with video cameras.
The grass snake uses different strategies when it’s attacked by a predator. One is playing dead, lying on the back with its mouth open and the tongue hanging out. I found this grass snake in autumn, when it was cold and it was unable to flee.
Related Laughing Squid Posts Granary Squirt, An App for Playing ‘Snake’ With the Fountains at Granary Square in King’s Cross, London How Canadians Take Their Trash Out A Toddler in a Lab Coat Attends to Her Beagle Brother After He Cut His Foot on Frozen Grass
